name: OB_HSB_DELIVERY_2
description: This table contains information about the delivery for this pregnancy, as entered in Stork's Delivery Summary activity.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the summary block record.

columns.name: AUGMENTATION_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date that augmentation of labor began.

columns.name: DEL_LIVING_CMT
columns.description: This provides users an opportunity to provide additional information about the living status in OB History.

columns.name: DEL_ADDL_CMT
columns.description: This provides users an opportunity to document information related to a delivery that is not captured elsewhere.

columns.name: OB_HX_LIVING_STAT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the living status in OB History, which reflects the current living status of the child. This status may be different than the living status set in the Delivery Summary.

columns.name: OB_DEL_PLCENTA_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date and time the placenta was delivered. This is the same value as in OB_HSB_DELIVERY.OB_DEL_PLCENTA_DTTM but converted to the local time of the delivery encounter. This column will be blank for deliveries documented directly in OB History.

columns.name: PUSHING_START_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant when the mother starts to push for the first time during a delivery.  This is the same value as in OB_HSB_DELIVERY.PUSHING_START_DTTM but converted to the local time of the delivery encounter. This column will be blank for deliveries documented directly in OB History.

columns.name: CORD_CLAMP_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the umbilical cord was clamped.  This is the same value as in OB_HSB_DELIVERY.CORD_CLAMP_DTTM but converted to the local time of the delivery encounter. This column will be blank for deliveries documented directly in OB History.

columns.name: DECISION_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant the decision was made for an emergent c-section.  This is the same value as in OB_HSB_DELIVERY.DECISION_DTTM but converted to the local time of the delivery encounter. This column will be blank for deliveries documented directly in OB History.

columns.name: BREAST_FEED_ST_LOC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant that breastfeeding was initiated. This is the same value as in OB_HSB_DELIVERY.BREAST_FEED_ST_DTTM but converted to the local time of the delivery encounter. This column will be blank for deliveries documented directly in OB History.

columns.name: DEL_PLACENTAL_WT
columns.description: This item stores the placental weight in ounces. This information is stored in the delivery records.

columns.name: ESTAB_RESPIR_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the  instant respiration was established for the newborn.

columns.name: OB_DEL_LABOR_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the labor type category ID for the delivery record.

columns.name: PRIMARY_INDUCTION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: Records a singular, primary reason for induction.
entries: Fetal Heart Rate or Rhythm Abnormality

columns.name: ETHNIC_GROUP_C_NAME
columns.description: The baby's ethnic group category ID for the historical delivery record.
